channel.title: [PI] 2 questions, buy 'X' & monster drops? [PI]
channel.description:
1. I was wondering how to change what items monster drops with PI?
Also
How can I add a buy 'X' button to my shops when buying runes/arrows etc?
Any help is appreciated thanks in advance

item.title: [PI] 2 questions, buy 'X' & monster drops? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

[quote=“Junes, post:4, topic:366940”][quote author=deans1243 link=topic=463136.msg3387686#msg3387686 date=1288629015]
for monster drops just go to data>cfg.npcdrops.tsm
make sure you open the .tsm and not the .cfg and here is how the drops are

#Man drops 1:1 995:100 554:100
[/quote]

wow that seemed so hard and needed to know what you were doing with coding didnt it sticky

gj dean ill +rep u cause even though its simple you explained well for a noob to understand properly lol (btw before anyone flames that noob comment isnt directed at anyone)[/quote]
junes when i said hard i swaer down i only quoted that …but didnt add quotations i didnt say it was hard for my self…

damn man…
basicly i was trying to say i changed my drop system before i had change to add drops this way so i could help

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] 2 questions, buy 'X' & monster drops? [PI]

make sure you open the .tsm and not the .cfg and here is how the drops are

#Man drops 1:1 995:100 554:100
[/quote]

wow that seemed so hard and needed to know what you were doing with coding didnt it sticky

gj dean ill +rep u cause even though its simple you explained well for a noob to understand properly lol (btw before anyone flames that noob comment isnt directed at anyone)[/quote]
oh well ty junes:) i try to help if i can:)

#npc name
npcid:drop rarity tab item id:item amount dropped tab item id:item amount dropped
constant id:amount dropped

remember for constants to work they have to be on a new line and they are dropped less frequently than the other ones

sexy-vampire this is for you ^^

item.description:

[quote=“stickywicky, post:2, topic:366940”]adding monster drops is hard with pi well unless you know what your doing…
i actually changed my whole pie npcdrop system and its completely different to pi now…sorry i cannot help[/quote]
If you are unable to help, then do not post.

And Vampire you are incorrect, first comes the item id, then the amount dropped. the rarer the item, the farther down the list it should be.

item.title: [PI] 2 questions, buy 'X' & monster drops? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

for monster drops just go to data>cfg.npcdrops.tsm
make sure you open the .tsm and not the .cfg and here is how the drops are

#Man drops 1:1 995:100 554:100
if you want it to skip a line like it says #man drops the # makes it skip that so you can put the name of the npc so it can be orginized.
on the next line the first number will be your npc id so 1 for man, then 1:1 the next number is the drop rareity 1 for really rare 100 for drops every time, then tab and the 995:100 is what it drops and how much of the item. so it will drop 100 coins for 995:100 and just tab and keep doing that for the items.
now for constants wich is rare drops u need to press enter and it has to be on a new line or it wont work
so say i want the man to drop 1m coins for a rare drop it would look like this

#Man drops 1:1 995:100 554:100 995:1000000
pm me if you need more help with the drops

Read full topic
